feature.name: Typography
feature.description: Keyword/fragment display that emphasizes semantic content from the conversation. Floats, fades, responds to mood.

tests.description: Typography renders keywords from semantic pipeline
Keywords are visually emphasized (size, color, glow)
In text mode: typography is subtle, ambient
In visual mode: typography is prominent, expressive
Typography accepts font family and base size config
Text fades out over time (configurable fade duration)
Typography handles positioning within canvas bounds
Motion control affects text drift/float behavior
Intensity control affects keyword emphasis strength
Typography can differentiate user vs AI content (subtle)
Keywords 'pop' or float independently based on mood

priorDecisions: CanvasRenderer provides drawText() with optional distortion
SemanticPipeline outputs keywords array (top 5 most relevant words)
MoodMapper outputs ColorPalette with primary, secondary, accent colors
Lo-fi, warm, a little weird - roughness is a feature
context.notes: Typography goes in src/primitives/Typography/. Displays keywords/fragments ONLY, not full conversation text. Full text stays in the existing chat UI. Consider floating/drifting animation for keywords.
